title: Bat boxes can become deadly roosts when the weather heats up, study finds
description: Artificial roosts, or “bat boxes”, have become a popular home conservation tool. But a new study raises concerns about the danger these boxes pose during heatwaves.
content:
Artificial roosts for bats or bat boxes are a popular way to conserve native species when their natural habitat has been depleted.
They are often used in urban areas to provide shelter where large t… [+6796 chars]

title: In a California farming region, researchers are mapping rural heat to protect farmworkers
description: In some of the most agriculturally rich regions in the U.S., researchers from San Diego State University are working to understand how climate change is impacting heat in rural areas and the farmworkers who toil in them

title: ‘A devastating global audit’ shows how climate change is undermining the health of millions
description: Extreme heat now kills one person every minute, according to a sweeping new report by the British medical journal The Lancet.
content:
This story is part of the Grist series Vital Signs, exploring the ways climate change affects your health. This reporting initiative is made possible thanks to support from the Wellcome Trust.
